about_the_game:
INVICTA: The Next Queen is a TopDown Soulslike game where a legendary warrior must fight her way through hell and claim her soul once more. Take the role of Moma as you explore the labyrinthian dungeons that make up the Circle of Greed and defeat King Midas in single combat.

Welcome to the 4th layer of Hell, realm of the greedy and the corrupt. Play as a fallen warrior of legend, hell bent on getting her soul back from the demons that took it. Rip and tear through the armies of King Midas, and put an end to the Reign of Gold. Will you be able to take the crown? Do you have what it takes to claim the throne of Hell?

  • Force your way open in 5 zones under the rule of Midas and his commanders. Discover secrets, fight enemies and teach them who will be the Next Queen of hell.
  • Embrace the chaos and break everything you can, you might even discover something interesting!
  • Beat Midas and all of his commanders in a face to face fight that will be written in the books of hell.

Synopsis


In life she was the most powerful woman to ever roam the earth. The mere uttering of her name made the mightiest warriors run in fear. Priests worshiped the dirt she walked on, and kings gave up their crowns before engaging her in battle.

And yet, she fell.

A single arrow pierced her heart, and plunged her into the depths of Hell. Moma, The Endless Warrior, was no more.

In her fall, The Lords of the Seven Circles, the rulers of the underworld, decided to split her soul. They would shatter it, and spread its pieces all over Hell, in an attempt to weaken Moma and keep her from conquering the kingdom of the dead. Taking it back, becoming whole again, would be a quest impossible for any mortal. But she is no mere mortal.

Now Moma, armed with self-righteous anger and her blade, has a single thing on her mind. Defeat the Lords of the Seven Circles and become The Next Queen of Hell.
